inputs.name: activate_api_identities
inputs.description:
The list of service identities (Google Managed service account for the API) to force-create for the project (e.g. in order to grant additional roles).
    APIs in this list will automatically be appended to `activate_apis`.
    Not including the API in this list will follow the default behaviour for identity creation (which is usually when the first resource using the API is created).
    Any roles (e.g. service agent role) must be explicitly listed. See https://cloud.google.com/iam/docs/understanding-roles#service-agent-roles-roles for a list of related roles.

inputs.name: activate_apis
inputs.description: The list of apis to activate within the project

inputs.name: auto_create_network
inputs.description: Create the default network

inputs.name: billing_account
inputs.description: The ID of the billing account to associate this project with

inputs.name: bucket_force_destroy
inputs.description: Force the deletion of all objects within the GCS bucket when deleting the bucket (optional)

inputs.name: bucket_labels
inputs.description: A map of key/value label pairs to assign to the bucket (optional)

inputs.name: bucket_location
inputs.description: The location for a GCS bucket to create (optional)

inputs.name: bucket_name
inputs.description: A name for a GCS bucket to create (in the bucket_project project), useful for Terraform state (optional)

inputs.name: bucket_project
inputs.description: A project to create a GCS bucket (bucket_name) in, useful for Terraform state (optional)

inputs.name: bucket_ula
inputs.description: Enable Uniform Bucket Level Access

inputs.name: bucket_versioning
inputs.description: Enable versioning for a GCS bucket to create (optional)

inputs.name: budget_alert_pubsub_topic
inputs.description: The name of the Cloud Pub/Sub topic where budget related messages will be published, in the form of `projects/{project_id}/topics/{topic_id}`

inputs.name: budget_alert_spent_percents
inputs.description: A list of percentages of the budget to alert on when threshold is exceeded

inputs.name: budget_amount
inputs.description: The amount to use for a budget alert

inputs.name: budget_display_name
inputs.description: The display name of the budget. If not set defaults to `Budget For <projects[0]|All Projects>`

inputs.name: budget_monitoring_notification_channels
inputs.description: A list of monitoring notification channels in the form `[projects/{project_id}/notificationChannels/{channel_id}]`. A maximum of 5 channels are allowed.

inputs.name: consumer_quotas
inputs.description: The quotas configuration you want to override for the project.

inputs.name: create_project_sa
inputs.description: Whether the default service account for the project shall be created

inputs.name: default_network_tier
inputs.description: Default Network Service Tier for resources created in this project. If unset, the value will not be modified. See https://cloud.google.com/network-tiers/docs/using-network-service-tiers and https://cloud.google.com/network-tiers.

inputs.name: default_service_account
inputs.description: Project default service account setting: can be one of `delete`, `deprivilege`, `disable`, or `keep`.

inputs.name: disable_dependent_services
inputs.description: Whether services that are enabled and which depend on this service should also be disabled when this service is destroyed.

inputs.name: disable_services_on_destroy
inputs.description: Whether project services will be disabled when the resources are destroyed

inputs.name: domain
inputs.description: The domain name (optional).

inputs.name: enable_shared_vpc_host_project
inputs.description: If this project is a shared VPC host project. If true, you must *not* set svpc_host_project_id variable. Default is false.

inputs.name: folder_id
inputs.description: The ID of a folder to host this project

inputs.name: grant_services_network_role
inputs.description: Whether or not to grant service agents the network roles on the host project

inputs.name: grant_services_security_admin_role
inputs.description: Whether or not to grant Kubernetes Engine Service Agent the Security Admin role on the host project so it can manage firewall rules

inputs.name: group_name
inputs.description: A group to control the project by being assigned group_role (defaults to project editor)

inputs.name: group_role
inputs.description: The role to give the controlling group (group_name) over the project (defaults to project editor)

inputs.name: labels
inputs.description: Map of labels for project

inputs.name: lien
inputs.description: Add a lien on the project to prevent accidental deletion

inputs.name: name
inputs.description: The name for the project

inputs.name: org_id
inputs.description: The organization ID.

inputs.name: project_id
inputs.description: The ID to give the project. If not provided, the `name` will be used.

inputs.name: project_sa_name
inputs.description: Default service account name for the project.

inputs.name: random_project_id
inputs.description: Adds a suffix of 4 random characters to the `project_id`

inputs.name: sa_role
inputs.description: A role to give the default Service Account for the project (defaults to none)

inputs.name: shared_vpc_subnets
inputs.description: List of subnets fully qualified subnet IDs (ie. projects/$project_id/regions/$region/subnetworks/$subnet_id)

inputs.name: svpc_host_project_id
inputs.description: The ID of the host project which hosts the shared VPC

inputs.name: usage_bucket_name
inputs.description: Name of a GCS bucket to store GCE usage reports in (optional)

inputs.name: usage_bucket_prefix
inputs.description: Prefix in the GCS bucket to store GCE usage reports in (optional)

inputs.name: vpc_service_control_attach_enabled
inputs.description: Whether the project will be attached to a VPC Service Control Perimeter

inputs.name: vpc_service_control_perimeter_name
inputs.description: The name of a VPC Service Control Perimeter to add the created project to

outputs.name: api_s_account_fmt
outputs.description: API service account email formatted for terraform use

outputs.name: budget_name
outputs.description: The name of the budget if created

outputs.name: enabled_api_identities
outputs.description: Enabled API identities in the project

outputs.name: group_email
outputs.description: The email of the G Suite group with group_name

outputs.name: project_id
outputs.description: ID of the project that was created

outputs.name: project_name
outputs.description: Name of the project that was created

outputs.name: project_number
outputs.description: Number of the project that was created

outputs.name: service_account_display_name
outputs.description: The display name of the default service account

outputs.name: service_account_email
outputs.description: The email of the default service account

outputs.name: service_account_id
outputs.description: The id of the default service account

outputs.name: service_account_name
outputs.description: The fully-qualified name of the default service account

outputs.name: service_account_unique_id
outputs.description: The unique id of the default service account
